analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin pa la rim dang cig car gyi don byed pa med do //
translated: For what is not momentary, sequential and simultaneous purposeful action does not exist.

original: dus snga phyir 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin gcig pa ni byed pa po nyid dang byed pa po ma yin pa nyid 'gal ba'i chos gnyis mi rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: dus snga phyir 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin gcig pa ni byed pa po nyid dang byed pa po ma yin pa nyid 'gal ba'i chos gnyis mi rigs pa yin no //
translated: For a single nature that does not change in earlier and later times, it is illogical for the two mutually exclusive properties of being an agent and not being an agent to exist.

analyzed: de la re zhig rim gyis ma yin te /

analyzed: rim pa dang bcas pa re re dus snga phyi la byed pa po dang byed pa po ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and each stage would be the agent and non-agent in the earlier and later times.

original: de lta bas na thams cad du rim pa med pa'i phyir bya ba thams cad la cig car 'ba' zhig tu da ltar bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na thams cad du rim pa med pa'i phyir bya ba thams cad la cig car 'ba' zhig tu da ltar bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: Thus, since there is no order at all, all actions are only present simultaneously.

original: de la dus snga phyir byed pa po nyid dang byed pa po nyid ma yin par shin tu 'gal bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la dus snga phyir byed pa po nyid dang byed pa po nyid ma yin par shin tu 'gal bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, it would follow that it is utterly contradictory to be an agent and not an agent in earlier and later times.

original: byed pa po nyid dang byed pa po nyid ma yin pa 'gal bas chos can gcig la mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po nyid dang byed pa po nyid ma yin pa 'gal bas chos can gcig la mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is contradictory for something to be an agent and not an agent with respect to a single basis.

original: ngo bo gcig pa yang dus de srid kyi bar du skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir 'di la rim dang cig car 'brel @310a * //üîΩpa med par 'grub po //
analyzed: ngo bo gcig pa yang dus de srid kyi bar du skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir 'di la rim dang cig car 'brel @310a * //üîΩpa med par 'grub po //
translated: Since a single entity is momentary for as long as it exists, it is established that it is neither sequential nor simultaneous.

original: de ltar na skad cig ma ma yin pa la khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yod pa nyid bkag pas skad cig ma nyid du gnas pa'i phyir skad cig ma nyid kyis khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na skad cig ma ma yin pa la khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yod pa nyid bkag pas skad cig ma nyid du gnas pa'i phyir skad cig ma nyid kyis khyab pa yin te /
translated: Thus, since the non-observation of the pervader is refuted in regard to that which is not momentary, it is pervaded by momentariness because it endures as momentary.

original: de la des khyab par chos can gang la grub pa der skad cig nyid du grub par byed do //
analyzed: de la des khyab par chos can gang la grub pa der skad cig nyid du grub par byed do //
translated: And, in regard to that, wherever the subject is established as pervaded by that, momentariness is established.

original: da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Now, this should be analyzed:üîΩFrom what subject is the pervasion apprehended here, without establishing the example subject?

original: dpe'i chos can na ma bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gang las 'dir khyab pa 'dzin zhe na kha cig ni dpe'i chos can las du ba bzhin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: dpe'i chos can na ma bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gang las 'dir khyab pa 'dzin zhe na kha cig ni dpe'i chos can las du ba bzhin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say: ‚ÄúLike smoke from the example subject.‚Äù

original: gzhan du na sgrub par byed pa'i don med pa'i phyir dang / khyab pa grub pas chos gnyis grub pa med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan du na sgrub par byed pa'i don med pa'i phyir dang / khyab pa grub pas chos gnyis grub pa med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir //
translated: Otherwise, because the purpose of the proof would be meaningless and because the pervasion is established, the two properties are not established as being in the relation of invariable concomitance.

original: gang gi phyir tshang bar du me dang du ba'i khyab pa grub ba na me grub pa na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshang bar du me dang du ba'i khyab pa grub ba na me grub pa na /
translated: Because, as long as the pervasion of fire and smoke is established, when fire is established,

original: yang me grub pa'i phyir rtags du ba las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pa tshol bar mi byed do //
analyzed: yang me grub pa'i phyir rtags du ba las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pa tshol bar mi byed do //
translated: Nor does one seek an inference from the reason smoke in order to establish fire.üîΩThe example is not similar.

original: mi 'dra bar bkod pa yin te 'di ltar /
analyzed: mi 'dra bar bkod pa yin te 'di ltar /
translated: For,üîΩOne grasps the pervasion in the example

original: de la chos gnyis mthong ba yis //
analyzed: de la chos gnyis mthong ba yis //
translated: by seeing the two properties.

original: dpe la khyab pa 'dzin pa yin //
analyzed: dpe la khyab pa 'dzin pa yin //
translated: But one grasps the pervasion in the subject

original: gtan tshigs tsam ni mthong ba yis //üîΩphyogs la khyab pa 'dzin pa yin //
analyzed: gtan tshigs tsam ni mthong ba yis // phyogs la khyab pa 'dzin pa yin //
translated: by seeing the mere reason.

original: de yang thams cad nyer bsdus pas //
analyzed: de yang thams cad nyer bsdus pas //
translated: And since that is a universal,

original: spyi nyid la ni dmigs pa ste //
analyzed: spyi nyid la ni dmigs pa ste //
translated: it is a universal that is perceived.

original: de ni chos can la 'jug pas //
analyzed: de ni chos can la 'jug pas //
translated: But since that is engaged with the subject,

original: rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa yin //
translated: it is understood by inference.

original: mngon sum gyis mthong ba dag gis me dang du ba rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor grub na de gnyis kyi khyab pa 'grub ste /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis mthong ba dag gis me dang du ba rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor grub na de gnyis kyi khyab pa 'grub ste /
translated: When fire and smoke are established as having the nature of cause and effect by means of the perception of the two properties, the pervasion of those two is established.

original: mngon sum gyis me dang ldan par 'grub pa ni rjes su dpag pa 'bras bu med pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis me dang ldan par 'grub pa ni rjes su dpag pa 'bras bu med pa yin no //
translated: But if the possession of fire is established by perception, inference is pointless.

original: khyab pa grub pa'i snga rol du tshad ma gzhan gyi chos can la skad cig ma nyid du grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyab pa grub pa'i snga rol du tshad ma gzhan gyi chos can la skad cig ma nyid du grub pa ma yin te /
translated: Prior to the establishment of the pervasion, the subject is not established as momentary by another valid means of knowledge.

original: 'dir sgrub par byed pa'i chos 'di kho na 'ba' zhig mthong bas bzlog na gnod pa can gyi stobs kyis de la skad cig ma gnyis kyis khyab par rtogs so //
analyzed: 'dir sgrub par byed pa'i chos 'di kho na 'ba' zhig mthong bas bzlog na gnod pa can gyi stobs kyis de la skad cig ma gnyis kyis khyab par rtogs so //
translated: Here, one sees only this very property that is being established, and when it is reversed, one understands the pervasion by two moments through the power of the counterevidence.

original: de la gang gis na sgrub par byed pa de don med pa yin /
analyzed: de la gang gis na sgrub par byed pa de don med pa yin /
translated: Here, why is the property that is being established meaningless?

original: don med pa nyid yin te skad cig ma nyid kyis khyab pa yod pa de bzhin du chos can la rtogs na skad cig ma nyid du yang rtogs so zhes zer na /
analyzed: don med pa nyid yin te skad cig ma nyid kyis khyab pa yod pa de bzhin du chos can la rtogs na skad cig ma nyid du yang rtogs so zhes zer na /
translated: It is meaningless because if the pervasion by momentariness exists, then when the subject is understood in that way, momentariness is also understood.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: thams cad bsdus pa dang ldan pa'i khyab pa ni bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa'i yan lag yin la /
analyzed: thams cad bsdus pa dang ldan pa'i khyab pa ni bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa'i yan lag yin la /
translated: The pervasion that possesses the inclusion of everything is a part of establishing the probandum.

original: de bas na 'di ni chos can gyi khyad par pa ltos pa med par sgrub par byed pa'i chos tsam dmigs pa ste /üîΩgang na du ba yod pa de na me yod do zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'di ni chos can gyi khyad par pa ltos pa med par sgrub par byed pa'i chos tsam dmigs pa ste / gang na du ba yod pa de na me yod do zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, this is the mere observation of the property that is being established, without regard to the particular subject,üîΩjust as in the case of where there is smoke, there is fire.

original: yang gang na tshang bang gi du ba yod pa de na me yod do zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang gang na tshang bang gi du ba yod pa de na me yod do zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not like where there is smoke from a kitchen fire, there is fire.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang gang yod pa de ni skad cig ma @310b yin no zhes bya bas khyab pa rtogs na sgrub par byed pa'i chos kyang chos can la yod pa'i nang du mi 'du na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos lta ci smos /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang gang yod pa de ni skad cig ma @310b yin no zhes bya bas khyab pa rtogs na sgrub par byed pa'i chos kyang chos can la yod pa'i nang du mi 'du na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos lta ci smos /
translated: So too, if one comprehends the pervasion that whatever exists is momentary, then the property of the probandum is included within the property of the subject, not to mention the property of the probandum.

original: de lta bas na yod pa'i spyi sgrub par byed pa'i chos phyogs kyi chos nyid khyab pa so sor rtogs nas de gnyis kyi nus pas bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la 'jug pa'i phyir gang gis na rjes su dpag pa 'bras bu med pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na yod pa'i spyi sgrub par byed pa'i chos phyogs kyi chos nyid khyab pa so sor rtogs nas de gnyis kyi nus pas bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la 'jug pa'i phyir gang gis na rjes su dpag pa 'bras bu med pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, since the property of the probandum is engaged in the subject through the power of comprehending the property of the subject, the pervasion of the property of the probandum, which is the universal of existence, those two are the property of the subject.

original: gal te de lta bu'i khyab pa rtogs na chos can la mchog tu 'dzin pa med pas khyab pa 'dzin na de la mthong ba'i yod pa'i khyab pa gang du rtogs te /
analyzed: gal te de lta bu'i khyab pa rtogs na chos can la mchog tu 'dzin pa med pas khyab pa 'dzin na de la mthong ba'i yod pa'i khyab pa gang du rtogs te /
translated: If one comprehends such a pervasion, then since one does not apprehend the subject as supreme, when comprehending the pervasion, where is the pervasion of existence that is seen?

original: dper na tshang bang du mthong bas me dang du ba'i khyab pa gzung bas dpe'i chos can la khyab pa gzung ba ma yin no zhes zer na ma yin te /
analyzed: dper na tshang bang du mthong bas me dang du ba'i khyab pa gzung bas dpe'i chos can la khyab pa gzung ba ma yin no zhes zer na ma yin te /
translated: For example, when one sees smoke in a kitchen, one grasps the pervasion of fire and smoke. It is not that one grasps the pervasion of the example subject.

original: khyab par 'dzin pa ni tshang bang la mchog tu 'dzin pa med do zhes bstan to //
analyzed: khyab par 'dzin pa ni tshang bang la mchog tu 'dzin pa med do zhes bstan to //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthere is no grasping of pervasion in the kitchen‚Äù is taught.

original: khyab pa dang phyogs kyi chos gnyis so sor rtogs pas kyang /
analyzed: khyab pa dang phyogs kyi chos gnyis so sor rtogs pas kyang /
translated: Also, by the individual realizations of the pervasion and the property of the subject,

original: gang la phyogs kyi chos nyid rtogs pa de nyid la bsgrub par bya bas khyab par rtogs pa'i phyir shugs kyis bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa ma yin nam ;
analyzed: gang la phyogs kyi chos nyid rtogs pa de nyid la bsgrub par bya bas khyab par rtogs pa'i phyir shugs kyis bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa ma yin nam ;
translated: since one realizes the pervasion of the probandum in that very place where one realizes the property of the subject, is the probandum not realized implicitly?

original: ji ltar sgrub par byed pa don med pa ma yin /
analyzed: ji ltar sgrub par byed pa don med pa ma yin /
translated: How is it that the proof is not meaningless?

original: 'on kyang phyogs kyi chos nyid rtogs pas bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang phyogs kyi chos nyid rtogs pas bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: However, the probandum is not realized by the realization of the property of the subject.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la ma reg pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la ma reg pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the property of the probandum is not touched.

original: khyab pa rtogs pa nyid kyang bsgrub par bya ba grub pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: khyab pa rtogs pa nyid kyang bsgrub par bya ba grub pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Also, the realization of the pervasion is not the establishment of the probandum.

original: spyi la dmigs pa nyid kyi chos can gyi khyad par gyi chos dag yongs su mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi la dmigs pa nyid kyi chos can gyi khyad par gyi chos dag yongs su mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the general object does not eliminate the specific properties of the subject.

original: gzhan du na khyad par gyi chos dag gis khyab par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na khyad par gyi chos dag gis khyab par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would follow, absurdly, that the specific properties would pervade the general object.

original: de lta bas na khyab pa'i yul 'dis shugs kyis gtan tshigs bstan to //
analyzed: de lta bas na khyab pa'i yul 'dis shugs kyis gtan tshigs bstan to //
translated: Therefore, the reason is implied by the pervasion of the object.

original: gal te gtan tshigs kyi tshul gsum yongs su bcad pa'i shugs kyis bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa 'byung ngo zhes zer na /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs kyi tshul gsum yongs su bcad pa'i shugs kyis bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa 'byung ngo zhes zer na /
translated: If you say that the understanding of the probandum arises by the force of the ascertainment of the trimodal conditions of the reason,

original: de lta na khyod kyi yang gtan tshigs don med pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta na khyod kyi yang gtan tshigs don med pa yin te /
translated: then your reason is pointless,

original: rang gi ngo bo nges pas bsgrub par bya ba nges pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nges pas bsgrub par bya ba nges pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the ascertainment of the probandum is generated by the ascertainment of its own nature.

original: de tsam las rtags kyi bya ba 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: de tsam las rtags kyi bya ba 'ga' yang med do //
translated: There is no other function of the reason than that.üîΩMoreover,üîΩif you wish to infer

original: gzhan yang / phyogs kyi chos nyid gzung ba las //
analyzed: gzhan yang / phyogs kyi chos nyid gzung ba las //
translated: the internal pervasion

original: 'brel pa yang ni dran pa yis //üîΩrjes su dpag pa byed 'dod na //
analyzed: 'brel pa yang ni dran pa yis // rjes su dpag pa byed 'dod na //
translated: by remembering the relationüîΩof the property of the subject,

original: de bzhin nang khyab kyang 'dod kyis //
analyzed: de bzhin nang khyab kyang 'dod kyis //
translated: then that is what we accept.

original: phyi'i khyab pa smra ba la yang khyab pa brjed pas rjes su dpag pas 'jug pa med do //
analyzed: phyi'i khyab pa smra ba la yang khyab pa brjed pas rjes su dpag pas 'jug pa med do //
translated: Also, in the case of external pervasion, because one forgets the pervasion, there is no engagement of inference.

original: de la gang gi phyogs kyi chos nyid rtogs pas de la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyab pa dran pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la gang gi phyogs kyi chos nyid rtogs pas de la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyab pa dran pa'i phyir /
translated: In that regard, some say: Because one comprehends the property of the subject of a specific position and recalls the pervasion of the probandum property in that subject,

original: ci'i phyir rjes su dpag pa thams cad don med pa @311a * //
analyzed: ci'i phyir rjes su dpag pa thams cad don med pa @311a * //
translated: why is it that not all inferences are pointless?

original: ma yin / bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la mchog tu mi 'dzin pas khyab pa dran pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na /
analyzed: ma yin / bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la mchog tu mi 'dzin pas khyab pa dran pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na /
translated: Because one recalls the pervasion by not holding the subject of the probandum to be supreme.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la mthong ba nyid kyis khyab pa dran pa'i phyir ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa yin /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la mthong ba nyid kyis khyab pa dran pa'i phyir ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa yin /
translated: If one recalls the pervasion by seeing the subject of the probandum, how can one not hold the subject of the probandum to be supreme?

original: khyab pa spyi la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yongs su mi gcod do zhes zer na /
analyzed: khyab pa spyi la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yongs su mi gcod do zhes zer na /
translated: If one says that because one observes the generality of the pervasion, one does not ascertain the subject of the probandum,

original: de la mthong bas ma yin nam ji ltar des yongs su mi gcod /
analyzed: de la mthong bas ma yin nam ji ltar des yongs su mi gcod /
translated: how is it not seen? How is it that it is not ascertained by that?

original: des yongs su gcod na yang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar khyab /
analyzed: des yongs su gcod na yang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar khyab /
translated: If it does, then how is it pervasion, since it is not shared?

original: ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa'i khyad par yin pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa ma yin no zhes zer na ;
analyzed: ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa'i khyad par yin pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa ma yin no zhes zer na ;
translated: If you say that it is not shared because it is a specific exclusion of non-connection,

original: de ltar na yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la mchog tu mi 'dzin /
analyzed: de ltar na yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la mchog tu mi 'dzin /
translated: then even in that case, it is not a part of the thesis, since it does not hold the subject as supreme.

original: gang dang gang na ri'i du ba yod pa de dang de na me yod do //
analyzed: gang dang gang na ri'i du ba yod pa de dang de na me yod do //
translated: Wherever there is smoke on a mountain, there is fire,

original: dper na tshang bang bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na tshang bang bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: like in a kitchen.

original: spyi la 'dzin pa'i khyab pa yod na chos can gyi khyad par la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir zhes zer na /
analyzed: spyi la 'dzin pa'i khyab pa yod na chos can gyi khyad par la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir zhes zer na /
translated: If there is a pervasion that holds a generality, then it is not a part that holds the subject as supreme.

original: 'di ni rigs te bsgrub pa'i chos can dang ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa dang / sgrub par byed pa'i chos kyi ngo bo gzhan nyid phyogs kyi chos nyid du bshad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni rigs te bsgrub pa'i chos can dang ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa dang / sgrub par byed pa'i chos kyi ngo bo gzhan nyid phyogs kyi chos nyid du bshad pa yin gyi /
translated: This is correct, because it is an explanation that the exclusion of non-connection with the subject of the thesis and the nature of the property of the thesis are the property of the subject.

original: de la khyab pa'i yan lag ma yin te /
analyzed: de la khyab pa'i yan lag ma yin te /
translated: It is not a part of the pervasion.

original: de med pas kyang spyi la dmigs pa'i khyab pa yongs su gcod pa grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med pas kyang spyi la dmigs pa'i khyab pa yongs su gcod pa grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because of the absence of that, the determination of the pervasion with respect to the universal is established.

original: gzhan du na dpe'i chos can la khyab pa 'dzin pa'i gtan du ji ltar 'gyur te de'i tshe phyogs kyi chos nyid mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na dpe'i chos can la khyab pa 'dzin pa'i gtan du ji ltar 'gyur te de'i tshe phyogs kyi chos nyid mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, how could there be a universal proposition with respect to the example, since at that time the property of the subject is not apprehended?

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid 'dzin na yang de nyid kyi tshe bsgrub par bya ba yang shugs kyis grub pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa thams cad don med par thal bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos ldan mi ldan las //

analyzed: mthun phyogs mi mthun phyogs su 'dod //

original: de la @313b gtan tshigs yod med ni //

analyzed: gang yin de ru gzung bar bya //

analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs de nyid la yod pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid de /

analyzed: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag yin no //

analyzed: de dag kyang gang yang rung ba'i chos can der gzung bar bya ste /

original: gang du gzung bar nus par ro //
analyzed: gang du gzung bar nus par ro //

original: / de la mthong ba'i gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa gzung ba'i phyir dang / chos gzhan mi srid pa'i phyir dang / srid na yang de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i don yod pa'i phyir ro //

translated: Because the pervasion of the reason by the consequence is grasped, because another property is not possible, and because if it were possible, the meaning of its consequence would exist.

analyzed: khyab pa mi 'dzin phyir bstan bya'i //

translated: Therefore, since it is possible to have a pervasion that includes everything, the proof of audibility, like existence, etc., is explained as being faultless.
